version_description:
NEW features:
- Auto skip stage directions, comments and blank lines while using VoiceTrack: PromptSmart can automatically scroll through blank lines and text that is between angled brackets which lets you add un-spoken words to your text without losing any functionality in VoiceTrack.

Bug fixes:
- Text now doesn't disappear when editing (prior to saving)
- VoiceTrack stability fixes and improvements

- ***Larger font setting added for both iPad and iPhone***
- VoiceTrack calibration improvements
- Blank lines and stage direction bug fixes
- Delete a notecard within a notecard presentation
- File download and cloud upload improvements (no longer times out)
- Load scripts directly from Gmail app and standard iOS mail app ("Copy to PromptSmart")
- Other stability/ performance enhancements and bugs

1. VoiceTrack 2.0!
-Glides over blank lines, single word lines, or list formats
-Optimized for larger font sizes on the iPad
-Further refinement to release soon!
2. Extended Subscription Cross-Compatibility
3. 1-month trial of Extended Subscription included stock
4. Other stability improvements

VoiceTrack 2.0!
-Glide through line breaks and numbered lists
-Larger font size available on iPad
-Scrolling accuracy enhancements (thanks to our testers!)

Other bug fixes and stability improvements

-Full video preview visible in Selfie Mode
-iOS 14 optimizations
-Remote Control app problems solved
-Maintenance and bug fixing
